paragraphs: Development Bank of Wales (DBW) was launched in 2017 as part of the Welsh Government's commitment to economic development in Wales. DBW provides loans, mezzanine finance, and equity investment to businesses, supporting sustainable economic growth across the region.

DBW's current risk management software contract expires in February 2025. As a growing financial institution, DBW manages over 450 risks and 1000 controls across its expanding business units. The need for a modern, scalable risk management platform has become critical to supporting their continued growth and regulatory compliance obligations.

We are pleased to present IBM OpenPages with Watson as our proposed risk management solution for DBW. OpenPages provides a comprehensive, AI-powered Governance, Risk and Compliance (GRC) platform that addresses DBW's current and future risk management needs.
bullet_points: Zero-training Task Based UI for immediate user adoption
Cognos reporting engine for advanced business analytics
Key Risk Indicators (KRI) monitoring and alerting
Risk Event Management and incident tracking
Modular platform with 11+ modules covering DORA, Compliance & Audit, Model Risk Management, ESG, Data Privacy, and Financial Controls Management

solution_profile.overview: IBM OpenPages with Watson is a market-leading AI-powered GRC platform that provides organisations with a unified approach to managing governance, risk, and compliance. Built on a flexible, modular architecture, OpenPages enables organisations to start with their most pressing GRC needs and expand over time.
